name: Chess Pizza (Prototype)
description:
“My name is Bruno, I am the owner of a pizzeria called Chess Pizza — opened by my dad in 1978. The business was not doing very well until, one day, a mysterious and generous customer, called Ron, appeared. He ordered pizza every day and left exaggerated tips. 

At first everything seemed perfect, $15 pizzas for which he paid me more than $60. Until, one day, his orders started getting weird…”

Chess Pizza is a 2D, pixel art, top-down, mystery-adventure game, where you try to save your pizzeria by making gross pizzas for an unknown, rich customer.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys / WASD
  • Interaction: Space / E
